newsitem.title: USA: NYSE suspends trading in Edison Brothers.
newsitem.headline: NYSE suspends trading in Edison Brothers.

text.p: The New York Stock Exchange said Friday that trading in the common stock of Edison Brothers Stores Inc will be suspended immediately, and that it will ask the Securities and Exchange Commission to delist the stock.

The exchange said the action is being taken following an Edison Brothers announcement on June 6 that the company's creditors and stockholders agreed to back a plan for the reorganization of the company, which is in Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings. As part of that plan, shareholders will be offered rights to purchase shares of new Edison Brothers stock.
The exchange also said that it has sought the delisting of the company because it does not meet the listing requirements for net tangible assets and net income.
